backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to involved frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing summaries of all major frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining OKLCH color tokens and global styles for light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for Home, Catalog, About, and Contact using SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/catalog/CatalogT: Toolbar with search input and sort dropdown for filtering and ordering catalog items.
frontend/src/components/catalog/ProductC: Card component showing product image, name, description, price, and an optional badge.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Client‑side validated contact form with success state and no external submission.
frontend/src/components/layout/BrandMark: Logo component displaying branding image from siteContent.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Main layout providing header, navigation, mobile menu, footer, and Outlet for pages.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Collec: Renders a grid of collection cards using siteContent, showing images, names, counts, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HeroSe: Displays the homepage hero section with background image, headline text, and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/content/noxContent.ts: Defines all static site content including hero text, collections, products, and branding configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file noting that the site uses static content and no backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles and custom CSS variables defining the site's light and dark color systems.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with brand story, promises, features, and owner information sourced from siteContent.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Displays a searchable and sortable product catalog using siteContent and renders ProductCard components.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the Contact page with store details, business hours, and a contact form using siteContent data and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the Home page featuring a hero section, featured products, and collection highlights driven by siteContent configuration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, goals, required images, existing features, and architectural notes for the NOX_WATCH website.
